Package common

Class Subscriber

java.lang.Object
common.Subscriber
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Subscriber extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a library subscriber with related subscription details, contact information, and status (active/frozen).
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Subscriber

      public Subscriber()
      Default constructor that initializes subscriberId to -1 and leaves other fields unset.

    • Subscriber

      public Subscriber(Subscriber subscriber)
      Copy constructor. Creates a new Subscriber by copying the properties of the given Subscriber.
      Parameters:
      subscriber - the subscriber to copy

    • Subscriber

      public Subscriber(int subscriberId, String subscriberName, int detailedSubscriptionHistory, int notificationHistory, String subscriberPhoneNumber, String subscriberEmail, int frozen)
      Constructs a Subscriber with the given details.
      Parameters:
      subscriberId - the subscriber's unique ID
      subscriberName - the subscriber's name
      detailedSubscriptionHistory - the subscriber's subscription history count
      notificationHistory - the subscriber's notification history count
      subscriberPhoneNumber - the subscriber's phone number
      subscriberEmail - the subscriber's email address
      frozen - the frozen status (1 for frozen, 0 for active)

    • isFrozen

      public boolean isFrozen()
      Indicates whether the subscriber is frozen (unable to borrow/reserve).
      Returns:
      true if frozen, false otherwise

    • setFrozen

      public void setFrozen(boolean frozen)
      Sets the frozen status of the subscriber.
      Parameters:
      frozen - true to freeze the subscriber, false to unfreeze
